transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you to the shops.
🚦 I drive on the road.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I can carry your family.

transport.question: I float on water and take you to far away places. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am big and can carry many people.
⚓ I need an anchor to stay still.
🚢 I go across the sea.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and can take you very far, very fast. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I have wings.
☁️ I fly above the clouds.
🌎 I can take you to another country.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and take many people. Choo choo!

hints.text: 🚂 I have many carriages.
🚦 I stop at stations.
👦 You can ride me to see Grandma.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal me with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: 🚲 You can ride me in the park.
🦵 I need you to push the pedals.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I take people around the city and stop to let people on and off.

hints.text: 🚌 I am big and yellow in some places.
🛑 You wait for me at a bus stop.
💰 You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I carry things but not people, and construction workers use me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚚 I am often big and strong.
🚧 I can carry rocks and dirt.
👷 You might see me at a building site.

transport.question: I can fly straight up and down, and have spinning blades on top.

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🚨 I am used to rescue people.
🏞️ I can land in small places.

transport.question: I go under the ground to move lots of people quickly around a city.

hints.text: 🚇 I am also called a subway.
🚏 You get on me at a station underground.
🌃 I am very useful in big cities.

transport.question: I'm like a motorcycle, but I have three wheels.

hints.text: 🛵 I am often used to carry things.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Some have a seat on the back, and some are used for deliveries.
🚚 I am a little different to a motorbike, as I have an extra wheel.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky. I'm big and round, and give off light, but I'm not the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot!
🌟 I am made of burning gas.
☀️ The biggest one helps plants grow.

cosmos.question: I am round and travel around the sun. I am where you live. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I have trees and oceans.
🏠 You can build a house here.
🌎 People call me 'The Blue Planet'.

cosmos.question: I am white and sometimes you can see me during the day, but I really shine at night. I go around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Werewolves like to howl at me.
🧀 Some people say I am made of cheese.
🌑 I have phases like crescent and full.

cosmos.question: I am very far away, and I have many, many stars inside me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 I am very big. Like, really, really big!
✨ I have a lot of gas and dust.
💫 The Milky Way is one of me!

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky. People want to visit me! What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 Robots have driven on me.
👽 People sometimes think aliens live on me.
🍫 I am named after a Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I am very, very hot and I am at the center of our solar system. All the planets go around me. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am a star.
🔥 I give Earth light and heat.
😎 You need to wear sunglasses to look at me (but don't look directly!)

cosmos.question: I have beautiful rings around me, made of ice and rock. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am a gas giant.
💍 My rings make me very special.
💨 I am made mostly of hydrogen and helium.

cosmos.question: I am a very big ball of gas, and I am the biggest planet in our solar system. I even have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My red spot is a giant storm!
💨 I am a gas giant.
👑 I am the king of the planets.

cosmos.question: Sometimes I fall from space and burn up in the sky, making a bright streak. People make wishes when they see me. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am a space rock.
✨ I am also called a shooting star.
🔥 I make a bright flash when I enter the atmosphere.

cosmos.question: I am made of ice and dust, and I have a long, bright tail when I get close to the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am a big dirty snowball from space.
💫 My tail always points away from the Sun.
☄️ I can take a very, very long time to orbit the Sun.
